pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample Size Calculation for the Comparison of Means or Proportions in Phase III Clinical Trials // There are four categories of Phase III clinical trials according to different research goals, including (1) Testing for equality, (2) Superiority trial, (3) Non-inferiority trial, and (4) Equivalence trial. This package aims to help researchers to calculate sample size when comparing means or proportions in Phase III clinical trials with different research goals.
